name: The Cure (itch) (TheAlexRobert)
description: The Cure by Alexander Robert, Kaelen Cook, and Aditi Karnik A satirical take on some conspiracy theories surrounding the current political landscape of the year 2021. The game is an endless bullet-hell shooter where you play a scientist vaccinating hordes of angry anti-maskers. You can utilize your 5G Ultra-wideband phone to stun the anti-maskers. Vaccinated anti-maskers spread the 5G signal from the chip implanted in them by the COVID-19 vaccine. (mini-tutorial: arrow keys, left-click and right-click)
